I am having some trouble with my messages being posted so I am posting 
this message with two different accounts.

I have made some headway with my scenario converter.  How so?  I added 
a feature that allows the user to copy existing scenario to a 
different scenario number and it works!!  

I have been using this new function with some if-then statements to 
change the locations of objects within a scenario, specifically "The 
Brag".  Yep, I am giving that map a much needed face-lift by 
increasing the thickness of outside walls and adding some more walking 
space to various places.

I know I have posted this twice before (apparantly yahoo has decided 
not to let my posts come through), but here are my comments on Orc 
Captains:

1)Orc Captains should have an ability called "Summon Formation".  This 
would have a stronger effect than "Summon Defense".  Also, weaker orcs 
might be enticed by this ability.

2)It might be usefull to give Orc Captains the ability to throw nets 
over opponents.  This would have the effect of immobilizing the 
opponent into the net is destroyed.

3)If an Orc is within some much distance of an Orc Captain on the same 
team, the Orc should receive some benefits: increased accuracy, 
increased hit points, etc..
